snippet: A woman in police custody who was killed by officers in downtown Atlanta had escaped from her handcuffs and fired gunshots at the officers from a patrol car’s back seat, the police said Friday.
abstract: Atlanta police say officers' return fire killed Alexia Christian, woman in police custody, after she slipped off handcuffs in patrol car's back seat and shot at officers in front seat with concealed handgun.
lead_paragraph: A woman in police custody who was killed by officers in downtown Atlanta had escaped from her handcuffs and fired gunshots at the officers from a patrol car’s back seat, the police said Friday.

headline.main: Georgia: Police Say Woman Slipped Cuffs and Fired
headline.print_headline: Georgia: Police Say Woman Slipped Cuffs and Fired
